abstract: General Electric opposes any regulation that would force it to split off its hefty finance business, its chief executive said in a memo to employees.
snippet: General Electric opposes any regulation that would force it to split off its hefty finance business, its chief executive said in a memo to employees.
lead_paragraph: General Electric opposes any regulation that would force it to split off its hefty finance business, its chief executive, Jeffery R. Immelt, said in a memo to employees on Monday, Reuters reports.

headline.main: Immelt Opposes Splitting Off GE Capital
